page.title: 14Girls' games,Balornock
page.content: I am an eleven year old girl and I live in Balornock which is in the North side of Glasgow.I attend Knockburn Primary School.The children in our school play lots of different games like balls,ropes and Chinese Ropes.My favourite game is{Chinese {Ropes}and this is how you play.You need about thirty elastic bands which you tie together into one big rope.You need two people to hold the rope out straight.These people are called "enders".The rest of the people playing have to jump the rope.The rope is held at different heights by the enders.They start by holding the rope at their ankles and then they go up gradually to knee,thigh,waist,shoulder etc until the rope is above their heads.At each change of height the jumpers jump the rope.If they cannot jump one height they must take an end.
